summary:
Senior producer, Project manager (human interest projects, events, book production,) and board member of Human Rights Film Network with commercial and NGO experience that lived and worked in Panama City, Brussels, Luxembourg, Amsterdam, Valencia and Barcelona. 

I speak: 
-Dutch 
-English
-French
-Italian
-Spanish 
-German.
 
Please feel free to contact me at abbyberg@gmail.com
